A new study suggests falling fertility rates will mean most countries could have shrinking populations by the end of the century

[Thread]

name: BBCWorld
text:
The BBC have looked at some of most dramatic population changes forecast, and the measures governments are taking to combat them in:

🇯🇵 Japan
🇮🇹 Italy
🇨🇳 China
🇮🇷 Iran
🇧🇷 Brazil 
🇮🇳 India 
🇳🇬 Nigeria 
https://t.co/xWA1eVM4bt https://t.co/k081DZYvLm

name: BBCWorld
text:
The BBC have looked at some of the most dramatic population changes forecast, and the measures governments are taking to combat them in:

🇯🇵 Japan
🇮🇹 Italy
🇨🇳 China
🇮🇷 Iran
🇧🇷 Brazil 
🇮🇳 India 
🇳🇬 Nigeria

name: BBCWorld
text:
Japan:

🇯🇵 Population set to more than halve by the end of 2099
🧓 World's oldest population (people aged 100+)
👵 Elderly will account for 35%+ of population by 2040
💼 Declining number of people able to fill jobs, due to low fertility rate - 1.4
https://t.co/xWA1eVM4bt https://t.co/X6a0HgLN6S

name: BBCWorld
text:
Iran: 

🇮🇷 Forecast significant decline in population by 2100
🌆 Annual population growth has dropped below 1%
👰 Marriages & children in decline
⚕️ Birth control only offered to at-risk women & no longer carried out at state-run medical centres
https://t.co/xWA1eVM4bt https://t.co/RwbImsLTTr

name: BBCWorld
text:
Brazil:

🇧🇷 Population set to fall by 47 million by 2100
👶 Decline in fertility rates over past 40 years
✝️ Soap operas portraying small families contributed to lower birth rates
🤰Launched a government campaign to stem high teenage pregnancy rates
https://t.co/xWA1eVM4bt https://t.co/0k4LM6TqnZ

name: BBCWorld
text:
India:

🇮🇳 Expected to overtake China as the most populous country in the world by 2100
👫 Population is expected to drop by 2 million at the end of the century
👶 Birth rate stands at 2.24 
👨‍👩‍👦 Prime Minister Narendra Modi called for smaller families
https://t.co/xWA1eVM4bt https://t.co/vC8ZPkjBvl

name: BBCWorld
text:
Nigeria:

🇳🇬 Population of sub-Saharan Africa expected to treble in size by 2100
👴 One of the largest working-age populations
🧒 Finance Minister Zainab Ahmed says there are a “lot of families who cannot even feed the children they have"
https://t.co/xWA1eVM4bt https://t.co/LYcxIqWawv
